description: Trex20 is revolutionizing and pioneering GameFi built on the Bitcoin protocol with multiple games, an NFTFi marketplace, and a progressive lottery all under one roof. Trex20 has a unique set of multiple collections and playable games inscribed on the Bitcoin blockchain. The Trex20 Genesis collection features a playable TREX game inscription, an OG game crafted for OG gamers on the OG chain.
name: Trex20
